enrichment.description: Wine Product 1 from Estate 0 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences. Crafted with attention to detail, it represents outstanding quality and traditional winemaking expertise.

tastingNotes.aroma: Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs with subtle earthy undertones
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors of plum and blackcurrant, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with lingering oak, dark fruit, and a touch of savory complexity

foodPairings: Grilled ribeye steak with herb butter
Braised short ribs with red wine reduction

servingInfo.decanting: Decant 30-45 minutes before serving to enhance aromatics
servingInfo.glassware: Large bowl red wine glass or Bordeaux glass

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, or cellar for 5-10 years for further development

enrichment.description: Wine Product 2 is a crisp, refreshing white wine that captures vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and incredibly versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a wide variety of dishes while offering excellent standalone enjoyment. A testament to quality white winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: Citrus blossom, green apple, ripe pear, hints of tropical fruit, subtle minerality and fresh herbs
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon zest, stone fruit, white peach, elegant texture with crisp finish
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus notes and mineral complexity

foodPairings: Grilled sea bass with lemon butter
Fresh oysters on the half shell

servingInfo.decanting: No decanting needed, serve well-chilled directly from bottle
servingInfo.glassware: Standard white wine glass or Chardonnay glass

wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed within 2-3 years of vintage for optimal freshness

enrichment.description: Wine Product 3 is an elegant sparkling wine that brings celebration to any occasion. With persistent fine bubbles and vibrant character, this wine offers sophistication and refreshing drinkability. Perfect for toasts, special moments, or as an aperitif to begin memorable meals.

tastingNotes.aroma: Citrus zest, green apple, brioche, almond, delicate floral notes with subtle yeast complexity
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with persistent fine bubbles, crisp acidity, flavors of apple, pear, white peach, and subtle toast
tastingNotes.finish: Refreshing, clean finish with lingering effervescence and bright citrus notes

servingInfo.glassware: Champagne flute or tulip glass to preserve bubbles

wineDetails.style: Sparkling wine, traditional or Charmat method
wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed within 1-2 years of purchase for optimal freshness

enrichment.description: Wine Product 4 from Estate 0 is a delightful rosé wine that captures the essence of summer and warm weather enjoyment. Light, fruity, and incredibly food-friendly, this wine brings refreshment and elegance to casual gatherings and refined dining alike. A perfect expression of the rosé style.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh strawberry, watermelon, rose petal, subtle citrus, hints of white peach and minerals
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with refreshing acidity, flavors of red berries, melon, citrus, elegant mineral undertones
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, crisp finish with bright fruit character and refreshing mouthfeel

foodPairings: Light pasta with tomatoes and basil

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh strawberry, watermelon, rose petal, subtle citrus, hints of white peach and minerals
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with refreshing acidity, flavors of red berries, melon, citrus, elegant mineral undertones
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, crisp finish with bright fruit character and refreshing mouthfeel

foodPairings: Light pasta with tomatoes and basil

servingInfo.decanting: No decanting needed, serve well-chilled
servingInfo.glassware: White wine glass or rosé-specific glass

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Grenache, Syrah, Pinot Noir, or Provence blend
wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed within 1-2 years for optimal freshness and fruit character

enrichment.description: Wine Product 393 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences. Crafted with attention to detail, it represents outstanding quality and traditional winemaking expertise.

tastingNotes.aroma: Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs with subtle earthy undertones
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors of plum and blackcurrant, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with lingering oak, dark fruit, and a touch of savory complexity

foodPairings: Grilled ribeye steak with herb butter
Braised short ribs with red wine reduction

servingInfo.decanting: Decant 30-45 minutes before serving to enhance aromatics
servingInfo.glassware: Large bowl red wine glass or Bordeaux glass

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, or cellar for 5-10 years for further development

enrichment.description: Wine Product 394 from Estate 39 is a crisp, refreshing white wine that captures vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and incredibly versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a wide variety of dishes while offering excellent standalone enjoyment. A testament to quality white winemaking.

tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus notes and mineral complexity

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh strawberry, watermelon, rose petal, subtle citrus, hints of white peach and minerals
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with refreshing acidity, flavors of red berries, melon, citrus, elegant mineral undertones
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, crisp finish with bright fruit character and refreshing mouthfeel

foodPairings: Light pasta with tomatoes and basil

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Grenache, Syrah, Pinot Noir, or Provence blend
wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed within 1-2 years for optimal freshness and fruit character

enrichment.description: Wine Product 913 from Estate 91 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences. Crafted with attention to detail, it represents outstanding quality and traditional winemaking expertise.

tastingNotes.aroma: Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs with subtle earthy undertones
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors of plum and blackcurrant, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with lingering oak, dark fruit, and a touch of savory complexity

foodPairings: Grilled ribeye steak with herb butter
Braised short ribs with red wine reduction

servingInfo.glassware: Large bowl red wine glass or Bordeaux glass

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, or cellar for 5-10 years for further development

Crafted with attention to detail, it represents outstanding quality and traditional winemaking expertise.

tastingNotes.aroma: Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs with subtle earthy undertones
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors of plum and blackcurrant, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with lingering oak, dark fruit, and a touch of savory complexity

foodPairings: Grilled ribeye steak with herb butter
Braised short ribs with red wine reduction

servingInfo.decanting: Decant 30-45 minutes before serving to enhance aromatics
servingInfo.glassware: Large bowl red wine glass or Bordeaux glass

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, or cellar for 5-10 years for further development

enrichment.description: Wine Product 978 is a crisp, refreshing white wine that captures vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and incredibly versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a wide variety of dishes while offering excellent standalone enjoyment. A testament to quality white winemaking.

tastingNotes.aroma: Citrus blossom, green apple, ripe pear, hints of tropical fruit, subtle minerality and fresh herbs
tastingNotes.palate: Medium-bodied with bright acidity, flavors of lemon zest, stone fruit, white peach, elegant texture with crisp finish
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus notes and mineral complexity

foodPairings: Grilled sea bass with lemon butter
Fresh oysters on the half shell

enrichment.description: Wine Product 1172 is a delightful rosé wine that captures the essence of summer and warm weather enjoyment. Light, fruity, and incredibly food-friendly, this wine brings refreshment and elegance to casual gatherings and refined dining alike. A perfect expression of the rosé style.

tastingNotes.aroma: Fresh strawberry, watermelon, rose petal, subtle citrus, hints of white peach and minerals
tastingNotes.palate: Light to medium-bodied with refreshing acidity, flavors of red berries, melon, citrus, elegant mineral undertones
tastingNotes.finish: Clean, crisp finish with bright fruit character and refreshing mouthfeel

foodPairings: Light pasta with tomatoes and basil

servingInfo.glassware: White wine glass or rosé-specific glass

wineDetails.grapeVariety: Grenache, Syrah, Pinot Noir, or Provence blend
wineDetails.ageability: Best enjoyed within 1-2 years for optimal freshness and fruit character

enrichment.description: Wine Product 1173 is a sophisticated red wine showcasing rich complexity and excellent structure. This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences. Crafted with attention to detail, it represents outstanding quality and traditional winemaking expertise.

tastingNotes.aroma: Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs with subtle earthy undertones
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors of plum and blackcurrant, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and baking spices
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with lingering oak, dark fruit, and a touch of savory complexity

foodPairings: Grilled ribeye steak with herb butter
Braised short ribs with red wine reduction

servingInfo.glassware: Large bowl red wine glass or Bordeaux glass

wineDetails.ageability: Drink now through 2030, or cellar for 5-10 years for further development

enrichment.description: Wine Product 1174 from Estate 117 is a crisp, refreshing white wine that captures vibrant fruit character and bright acidity. Perfectly balanced and incredibly versatile, this wine pairs beautifully with a wide variety of dishes while offering excellent standalone enjoyment. A testament to quality white winemaking.

tastingNotes.finish: Clean, refreshing finish with lingering citrus notes and mineral complexity
